name: cumberland
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area of northwestern England that was a county (= an area with its own local government) until 1974: He decided to establish himself near Keswick in Cumberland. She began the long journey down from Cumberland to Southampton.
More examplesFewer examplesCumberland combined with Westmorland in the 1970s to create the modern county of Cumbria.They went for long, pleasant walks in Cumberland. The nuclear reactor at Windscale in Cumberland began to overheat.
